SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.utils

Class Chat

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.Chat
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Chat extends Object implements Serializable

Class that implements an ArrayList of messages creating a chat.

It manages the addition and removal of messages in the Chat and it preserves them in an ArrayList that becomes the Chat's history.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Chat

      public Chat()
      Constructor standard that sets the maximum number of messages contained in a Chat automatically to 20.

    • Chat

      public Chat(int maxNumberOfMessages)
      Constructor that sets the maximum number of messages contained in a Chat to maxNumberOfMessages.
      Parameters:
      maxNumberOfMessages - The maximum number of messages in the chat's history.

  • Method Details

    • addMessage

      public void addMessage(ChatMessage message)

      Method that adds a new ChatMessage into the Chat.

      In case the Chat is full it refreshes the history of messages by deleting the oldest one.

      Parameters:
      message - ChatMessage to add.

    • addMessage

      public void addMessage(String username, String message)

      Method that creates a new ChatMessage from the given username and message and adds it into the Chat.

      In case the Chat is full it refreshes the history of messages by deleting the oldest one.

      Parameters:
      username - Player sending the message.
      message - Message sent.

    • addMessage

      public void addMessage(String forwardingPlayer, String message, String receivingPlayer)

      Method that creates a new ChatMessage from the given forwarding player, message and receiving player and adds it into the Chat.

      In case the Chat is full it refreshes the history of messages by deleting the oldest one.

      Parameters:
      forwardingPlayer - Player sending the message.
      message - Message sent.
      receivingPlayer - Player receiving the message.
